plot: Father Tucker, the most perverse priest in Christendom, gets his hands on infantile treasure. The only thing standing in his way is his Highest Superior on Earth.
title: Father Tucker in Infallible
plot_es: Father Tucker, the most perverse priest in Christendom, gets his hands on infantile treasure. The only thing standing in his way is his Highest Superior on Earth.
plot_en: Father Tucker, the most perverse priest in Christendom, gets his hands on infantile treasure. The only thing standing in his way is his Highest Superior on Earth.
